𒋡 KA 𓂓 'K' Letter of Elamite logo-syllabic script (Monumental Achaemenid inscriptions, 5th century BCE)

𒋡 KA 𒆐 kad2 𒋂 cry 𒆑 kad3 𒄧 gurun = 𒇫 gurun₄

𒋡 ≈ 𒁹𒋡 ≈ 𒋖

𒋡 KA QA 𒊭 que ta

𒋡 K Kilo ⋍ 1l “CUP” ⇔ 𒄥 Kor 𒄖𒌑 qû

𒋡 K Kilo in 𒊺𒋡 ≈ 𒉣𒋡 ≈ 𒈦𒋡 ≈ 𓆼 in Proto-Cuneiform <> 𒌇𒋡 thousand <> 𒉌𒋡 𒉀 naga

𒋡 sila in varius s forms 𒋗𒋡 𒋧 𓇗 𓇓 𒊺𒋡

𒋡 sila calla "street"

𒋡 sila (achilles) "heel"

𒋡 sila₃ < šir₃ 𒂡 in 𒄑𒆕𒋡 Geschirr 𒂡 ḪIR "harness" 𒆟

𒋡 sila₃ csali iscaᵃˡ "bait" < ēsca 'eat'

𒋡 KAᵈ Köder "bait" <> kill?

𒋡 KAᵗ cut (of meat)

𒋡 Kappa K κάππα KA ķa ḳa

𒋡𒉡 qa-nu cane 𒄀 GIᵒⁿ 𒋡𒉡 qa-nu gnat 🦟

𓂝 ⲕⲁϩ 𒆏 KAP 𒋡 •carp™ > cubit cubitum "elbow"

𒋡 ⋍ 𓊃 in

𒋡𒁄 qa-bal cabal quarrel

𒋡𒁍𒌨 qa-pu-ur qapur ⋍ 𓊃 𓊪 𓊗 •ćapur : medicine, drug, dose, portion (of food)

[missing sign] ≈ 𒋡𒑊 ≈ 𒋰𒁹𒑊 ≈ 𒄞 GUD cattle

𓋨 𓅱 | treasurers, seal-bearers | 𓋧 | 𓋩 𓏏 𓏛
𒋡𒀭𒍝𒁀𒊏 ka4-an-za Kanzel, Kasse (treasury) *kaznь. Kanzel (punishment) < *kʷeḱ- “to see” kuck!
𒋡𒀭𒍝𒁀𒊏 ka4-an-za-ba-ra /kanzabara/) Achaemenid Elamite chanselor, treasurer
𒋡𒀭𒍝𒁀𒊏 ka4-an-za-ba-ra < 𒃶𒍝𒁀𒊒 (gan-za-ba-ru /ganzabaru/) (Late Babylonian) Akkadian: treasurer
𒋡𒀭𒍝𒁀𒊏 ka4-an-za-ba-ra казначе́й kaznačéj
𒋡𒀭𒍝𒁀𒊏 ka4-an-za-ba-ra ⇔ казначы qaznaçı ხაზინადარი xazinadari خەزىنىچى xezinichi treasurer
𒋡𒀭𒍝𒁀𒊏 ka4-an-za-ba-ra >> גִּזְבָּר gizbar treasurer ++

𒋡𒈩𒋾 qaᵖ-rit-ti > про́тив prótiv प्रतियोगी prati(yogī) que.parti (opponent)

𒆳𒉡𒄄𒀀 KUR.NU.GI 𒆳𒉡𒄄𒀀

Clear connection between K 𒋡 𓂓 ( sumerian cuneiform was rotated 90° ) but no known semantic connection (work/soul)

𒋡 KA already used in Sumerian times e.g. in cattle list 30 𒋡𒌅 / 30 𒋡𒂃 …

𒈗 king 𒊭 que QA 𒋡 KA

𒊭 ša < tha < TA 𒋫 gunu 𒋗 šu
𒊭 ša < que 𒋡 QA KA 𓆑 4 ЧⲦⲞⲞⲨ

𒋡 cow 𒋫 Taur 𒊭 Saurus

𒋡𒉡 qa-nu cane, reed, an insect (moth?)
𒃶 qan “cane” in 𒃶𒊭𒆷𒇻 qan ša-la-lu a reed 𓇑 𓇓 𓇔 𓇗 𓇖
𒄀𒈾 gi.na QANÛ cane cannabis (wegen phyth fish נפש)

𒈠𒋡𒌅 ma-qa-tu ma.kaatua < 𓐍 𓂋 𓀒 kartam
